name: socialistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to socialism (= the belief that all people are equal and should share equally in a country's money): The members of the group are all socialistically thinking working men. Future production will be socialistically organized, taking into account the needs of society and producing as much as society needs.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Book Club was a meeting point for socialistically minded people, ranging from Communists to mild liberals.As a politician, her programmes are big and socialistically oriented.Some socialistically inspired utopias were based on the ideal of the family.
